website_summaries.verdict: Worldly looks and top-notch specs make the impressive, metal Samsung Galaxy S6 the Android phone to beat for 2015.
pros: The upscale Samsung Galaxy S6's smooth glass-and-matte-metal body, improved fingerprint reader, and convenient new camera shortcut key make the phone a stunner
Samsung's decluttered take on Android 5.0 brings the beauty inside, too
cons: Longtime fans will bristle at the Galaxy S6's nonremovable battery and absent expandable storage
The phone has an intensely reflective backing and looks embarrassingly like the iPhone 6
Battery life, while good, falls short of last year's Galaxy

customer_reviews.title: Junk and a phone scam
customer_reviews.text: Phone was defective. The fingerprint sensor didn't work right. It wouldn't authenticate after setting it up. The phone also would not connect to any cell phone towers and could not make phone calls. This also cost me a lot of money as I had to pay twice for activation fee, then upgrade fee to switch from this pile of junk to a phone available from Verizon. It also forced me out of a promotion losing me a further $120 on top. In my opinion not only should this have been a refund, but owed me for the money lost.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Risto

customer_reviews.title: I liked the phone
customer_reviews.text: I liked the phone. However, in one month I periodically started to lose service. The display indicated "Searching for Service" instead of "Verizon Wireless". Every time I lost service I had to wait longer and longer (for hours) until service was back. Now, in less than 3 months after purchasing the phone, it lost the service forever. I have checked my sim card on another phone. It works perfect on other one, not on my Samsung Galaxy S6. I have to buy a new phone now (the limited warranty was 30 days), so this purchase was a complete loss of money. The phone was indicated as a "NEW", but now I don't think it was true.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiy Belizov

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice refurbished phone! This is my second purchase of a galaxy refurbished phone. I bought a s4 mini refurbished phone and had no trouble @ all out of it and I packed it for 6 months on my 2016 thru-hike of the AT (Appalachian Trail). I bought this one for my 2018 thru-hike of the PCT. Verizon is definitely the best carrier on those two trails.. +++stitches+++
customer_reviews.author: +STITCHES+

customer_reviews.title: Disable Text-to-Speech
customer_reviews.text: Great phone but one month into owning and using it, the Text-to-Speech app suddenly started by itself, talking through the whole tour, and eventually locking me out completely. After chatting with a Verizon rep online to have the problem fixed, I had to do a factory reset. However, the problem returned once I restarted the phone. I had to bring it to a Verizon store to have someone actually work on it to disable the app and return the phone to its original condition. This is something Samsung needs to tweak.
customer_reviews.author: Remo Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, personal preference though I prefer the Edge.
customer_reviews.text: Of course this is a great phone. I have to say though I honestly preferred the Edge version. Getting this at 32 gigs was not a smart move but I needed something fast and didn't have much money. The S6 went to the next level, you no longer have to swipe your finger down for fingerprint unlocking, just place it there and you're in. The speed is amazing and it handles most apps with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Love
customer_reviews.text: I am a Samsung electronic lover. I have ventured into the iPhone world, stepped on Nexus property and dilly dallied with LG. As long as Samgsung keeps rolling out new editions, I will keep buying them. The application process is fast and customizable. The appearance is slick, bright and takes vivid pictures. The seller shipped the phone quicker than promised and arrived packaged effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Bevin

customer_reviews.title: Wrong phone sent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone in white, when it arrived,it was a black phone.i tried to put cell phone charger that came with it but charger did not fit phone,wrong charger was sent to me.wished I didn't order this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa  &  Baby jack

customer_reviews.title: This item was faulty.
customer_reviews.text: This phone did not work like it should. I have Verizon which is the best cell phone provider in my area. When we switched over from my old phone to this phone I couldn't get internet unless I was in my home I frequently could you get calls or make calls the phone was useless.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Stambaugh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone!
customer_reviews.text: I'm typically wary of buying phones online as I have been scammed once before, but this time my fears were unfounded, as my new S6 arrived in new condition and worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Surgeon Rick

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Here I am in 2019 still using this phone. Has been a good phone even for a refurb. The battery life was poop from the beginning but I think that has more to do with the S6 only having a 2500mah battery than it being refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT IS NOT NEW ! FALSE ADVERTISEMENT !! DO NOT BUY !
customer_reviews.text: product was NOT new as listed .. i was lied to and sold a refurbished one when i paid for a new one ! If thats not false advertisement i don't know what is. DO NOT BUY . Save your money and go else where i wish i did!
customer_reviews.author: elise

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was super anxious about ordering a phone online... but this phone was in excellent condition. It was refurbished, and there were only two tiny dings on the edges (which the description noted). I was so impressed and my fiancé loves it. It works incredibly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah F.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung S-6
customer_reviews.text: The phone is in greatcondition. It came with charger and cable, and it is now on Verizon service. We have NOT set up the fingerprint reader as yet. I consider it a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks new has problems all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Have problems with the intent strength a shop is saying it's the antenna. Every day it will do a system update some times two times. I'm not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert w. Beck III

customer_reviews.title: I love the camera
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera. Bad things though- you have to double tap the keys sometimes to get them to move, and the camera won't focus. I've done everything I can to reset it, Google to Everything, YouTube everything, I can't take pictures with it. The auto focus will not work no matter what I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: TLB

customer_reviews.title: preloaded apps not wanted
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item as there were multiple unwanted apps loaded that were a hinderence to setting this phone up. i just gave yp and returned the unit. I do not need their games....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected, it's new
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what it supposed to be, a new phone.
customer_reviews.author: IhateApple

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Only had this for one month and the digitizer went out. This phone was sold as new. Getting run around trying to find out about a refund or replacement. Not a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: Jacki C.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Item was labeled as new but didn't appear new when arrived. Didn't come in original packaging... no manual ,no ear buds...etc.. usually new phones come with all that.makes me wonder if it was refurbished or something. Been using it for little over a month now and no complaints or issues.. good phone
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L

customer_reviews.title: Phone was stated used and working. Self camera shows ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone was stated used and working. Self camera shows heavy blue specks on camera even when taking picture. Charger that came with phone is not OEM and cannot charge.
customer_reviews.author: marko

customer_reviews.title: FUNKY CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: Phone works good, but the camera vibrates like a rollercoaster if you load up any apps that use the camera and are tilted against gravity in any ways. Battery accuracy % is off as well, minor scuffs on sides, obviously dropped atleast once. Not bad for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: DanManCan

customer_reviews.title: Are we tricked????
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband. Turns on and off by itself. Needs a new battery and it's very slow. I'm not happy what so ever

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Stopped charging as of July 29, ordered May 8. I guess order from this seller if you want a phone that lasts two months.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Gates

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, avoided device fees!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this phone for our child to avoid paying the device fees all carriers have switched to and we're glad we did! Phone works great and arrived in great shape. Son loves his new phone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Once I received this item I brought to Verizon to ...
customer_reviews.text: Once I received this item I brought to Verizon to get it set up and it wouldn't power up. Tried three times - so need to return.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted three months then stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked for three months and the screen blacked out. Phone could no longer be used.

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was dirty on outside
customer_reviews.text: Speculated whether this was refurbished or new. Packaging was dirty on outside, but appeared new for accessories. About a month in, the speaker has a fuzz noise, which leads me to suspect refurb. Either way, it is what I needed and wanted, so would but again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Secor

customer_reviews.title: Overall very satisfied though.
customer_reviews.text: A few dings at the bottom, and it freezes a few times. Overall very satisfied though.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately had to send back. There was something wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The phone is great, but they sent me a broken charger.
customer_reviews.text: The phone was nice, not broken in any way and fit the description given; however, the charger cord that came with was broken, which is aggravating because now I have to share one charger between my tablet and my phone. I would have hoped that Amazon would send me unbroken products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and looks to be in good condition. Downside is it keeps crashing and rebooting ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone came fast, and looks to be in good condition. Downside is it keeps crashing and rebooting randomly and often :(
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Gato

customer_reviews.title: Best Galaxy device yet!
customer_reviews.text: Best Galaxy device yet! Non-removable battery doesn't bother me but a removable storage would've been nice. Over all, great smart phone!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Price was good. Doesn't have a slot for sd card.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok after multiple visits to have things fixed and reinstalled. Now, after 3 months, text and phone are totally gone. I should have just returned it the first time something went wrong .

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, definitely recommend. Awesome picture quality, which is what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: The phone is having a serious glitch,
customer_reviews.text: The phone is having a serious glitch, my calls come through and my alarm rings but the phone has a black screen and
customer_reviews.author: Amber T Watson

customer_reviews.title: Samsung phones are good but dissapointed that they sent a bad charger.
customer_reviews.text: The phone is fine but the charging cord does not work. I had to buy a charger in order to be able to use my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Perham

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone did not last 3 months and after it was repaired last 1 additional month.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my daughter and she loves it. She's had the phone for a few months and hasn't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Came on time and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Yes it was exactly what I wanted. Came on time and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda K Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, shipped fast. The battery however did not last as long as the droid I had previously. But it is decent. Takes great photos, makes good calls. Overall a great phone

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone but battery drains to fast. Needs better one

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: Good durable phone easy to use and stylish not to big and not too small

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It had a few scratches on the screen, but it's worth it..

customer_reviews.title: Previously repaired and the home button is not properly reinstalled ...
customer_reviews.text: Previously repaired and the home button is not properly reinstalled. The overall quality is lacking from a standard S6 from Verizon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: My wife is in love with this phone got it for her for birthday present and hasn't had any complaints about it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money and the company that we bought from was great
customer_reviews.author: Melony B.

customer_reviews.title: which was great, but with the design
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really care for the Samsung galaxy s6. Nothing wrong with how the phone works, which was great, but with the design. I'm used to holding my phone along the bottom and with the controls situated along the bottom I keep hitting them just holding the phone. I tried to hold it by the sides but kept pressing those buttons. Ended up returning it, just wasn't happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Not new. USB port loose and worn, damage to surround aluminum. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The charger that I received in the ktd was for an iPhone not a galaxy phone

customer_reviews.title: The charge was excellent in the beginning
customer_reviews.text: The charge was excellent in the beginning. Now after about 3 months, the battery stays charged for about 3 hours, after average use.
customer_reviews.author: AtLgUrl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in like new condition, as promised, which original packaging. No scratches or scuffs, in perfect working order.

customer_reviews.title: I cant even get my phone to get signal. ...
customer_reviews.text: I cant even get my phone to get signal. Ive taken it to 2 verizon stores and have had it activated multiple times yet nothing.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Studer

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a negative review-follow up to come.
customer_reviews.text: Let me begin by saying that this is not a negative review. My package was delivered in a timely manner. Unfortunately I was not able to pick it up the day it was delivered due to C -19 constraints. As of today I am in possession of my new phone. This was sold as a ‘new in the box Samsung Galaxy S6 White Pearl Verizon’. Everything ‘looks’ good, except the enclosed ppwk says AT&T. We shall see. I have pictures but don’t know how to add them to the review.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Shopper

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY WITH BHS GLOBAL!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BHS GLOBAL has phone listed as new,the only reason I bought it. I bought August 27, 2019. By November battery completely eroded. I purchased the extended waranty. They won't cover it because it was sold as new. Samsung won't cover it because it was orginally bought & use Juky 2015. Horrible people $250 and 3 months I have no phone

customer_reviews.title: Pics is key
customer_reviews.text: It pay to have pics up.. this was a used phone it arrived fast and with the quickness. Not a scratch or nuffin. I seen several phones cheaper but no pics. I needed that piece of mind, well worth the extra bucks to get a used phone not refurbished phone with no scratches or dents.
customer_reviews.author: BiZ WorLD

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a christmas gift. Phone shuts off continuously. It won't allow download from old phone, pictures, contacts etc.. JUNK... I am happy that Amazon is refunding my money
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: It was a great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item which was described as "refurbished - very good" and it looks basically brand new. There were no visible scratches on the front or back. And it works perfectly. The only blemish was a ding on one corner that was hardly noticeable. It was a great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H'ghar

customer_reviews.title: Battery life out of the box was atrocious. Can ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery life out of the box was atrocious. Can not see this lasting one day, even with power settings on maximum saver mode, low screen brightness, and no gps/bluetooth functionality.
customer_reviews.author: O. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Shortly after the return window closed the phone started shutting ...
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after the return window closed the phone started shutting down because the batterty kept going dead even when on the charger. We took the phone to a repair place and replaced the battery. Then in May (purchased in Feb 2018), the phone quit allowing to calls to be made or received. Then on July 8th the screen turned purple without a cause and does not work.
customer_reviews.author: R.E.

customer_reviews.title: I've had it over a month and so far so good, EXACTLY like my brand spanking new one
customer_reviews.text: This is my second S6, because my first one went to the fishes. Ugh, anyways I purachsed this one used on Amazon, I've had it over a month and so far so good, EXACTLY like my brand spanking new one. I would have splurged for the waterproof S7 had I been able to justify spending an extra $300 on nearly the exact same piece of technology.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: There are better ones.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know it didn't have an SD slot so there is no way to expand the memory. The screen was broken when I got it. Just unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Moss

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! It is amazing. The phone came in fast which was great. The display of the screen is amazing and extremely clear. The camera is very easy to access and the resolution is clear and bright. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Samsung s6....nice phone...nice price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived several days before the promised delivery date...the phone is in great shape as decribed in the description...and is strait talk compatable...it also came with a charging cord...love the phone and the price...very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: shelly everett

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after  10 months
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after 10 months. Verizon said it was a lemon. Cell Surfers and Amazon Prime referred us to the manufacturer which is somewhere in China. Warranty is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: This phone will not hold the charge.
customer_reviews.text: This phone will not hold the charge. I'm very dissatisfied with the charge ability it just don't hold a charge I have to charge it three times a day
customer_reviews.author: Debbybyrne

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, better than its competition.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone one of the best compared to its current competition. With wireless charging and one of the better cameras on the market this a top notch phone. Amazon lets you buy this phone without having to go through Verizon's rebate which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Blacklisted Phone - Completely Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This phone is blacklisted and is unusable. As far as I can tell, this is a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: BEST. PHONE. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this phone almost a month ago. Everything is still working fine and I love it!! I've wanted the S6 since it came out. Totally worth it for the price. Rather then paying $500+. I got this phone for less then $300.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed! !!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in march hoping it would live up to the samsung name. Unfortunately, it only lasted for 2 months. Then the sound to started buzzing to the point where I couldn't understand what was said. Then most recently the volume has gone all the way out. I can't have a conversation without using speaker . Most of the time I have to wait until I'm alone and return the call. Who wants to talk with others listening to the conversation. I sent a question to the seller inquiring about the warranty,NO RESPONSE! Well, can't afford to buy a new phone every eight months. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Berry1959

customer_reviews.title: Came in perfect condition and runs very well
customer_reviews.text: No issues with it at all. Came in perfect condition and runs very well. An older model phone actually completely new.
customer_reviews.author: Anonym.

customer_reviews.title: I've upgraded to Nougat and tried the battery management tools and still it's absolutely terrible. There is no way this is normal and ...
customer_reviews.text: Maximum standby-time on battery is approximately 2 hours. I've upgraded to Nougat and tried the battery management tools and still it's absolutely terrible. There is no way this is normal and I can't replace the battery. This phone is basically useless unless on airplane mode or plugged in. And for the record I disable everything, I don't use social media (disable facebook, Google Voice, everything), the only app I have downloaded is Spotify, and I use my phone in an extremely utilitarian way. There is no reason this should be happening.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just got it so a few days will tell Seems fine
customer_reviews.author: stephen tysinger

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Screen has large deadspots even though the product is listed as new.
customer_reviews.author: ZakG

customer_reviews.title: but it was I need great condition and I love it
customer_reviews.text: My phone wasn't white,it was sapphire blue...but it was in great condition and I love it! Took a bit longer then expected due to transit delays but totally worth the wait! Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Terence H.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Quick safe and secure delivery of a product exactly as described. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother!
customer_reviews.text: Can't get the back off even with the little tool provided. Verizon rep couldn't do it either! I didn't see reviews that said the back was impossible to remove so not sure if this is a factory defect but I'm not going to bother replacing with a new one because also, I don't understand why you cannot get a prepaid plan for the S6 when you can for the S7 which is a newer version. I ordered the S7 and hoping that it's made better!
customer_reviews.author: MBD IN FLORIDA

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped faster than I expected. Great phone.. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: but so far everything has been great. Works great with the CHOE Stadium Qi Wireless ...
customer_reviews.text: Too much stuff to make a full review this early, but so far everything has been great. Works great with the CHOE Stadium Qi Wireless Charger 3-Coils I also ordered, even with the case attached.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nelson

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S6, White Pearl 32GB (Verizon Wireless)
product_meta.description: Service Provider:verizon| Color:White| Size:32 GBSamsung Galaxy S6 Cell Phone for Verizon Wireless: This phone is constructed from metal and glass for a sturdy, high-quality build, while its ultra-fast processor makes for exceptional multitasking. It comes packed with features, like a fingerprint reader, advanced cameras on both sides of the phone, and a heart rate monitor. Plus, Samsung Pay allows you to swipe this phone as if it were a credit card to process fast, secure payments without pulling out your wallet. *SIM Card not included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars165 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Touchscreen, Built-in-gps, Bluetooth-enabled, Dual-camera, Lte, Smartphone
specifications.Included Components: Pre-Installed SIM Card, Wall Charger, Galaxy S6, SIM Removal Tool, Stereo Headset, USB Cable, Quick Start Guide
